metadata.synopsis: A disguised Viconia approaches the player and sits down beside them. They will ask questions to uncover the depths of their psyche. Before potentially inviting them to enter the Grotto.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Bring Shadowheart2. Go to the House of Grief3.Talk to Mirie to get permission to enter.4. Enter the backroom5. Sit down on bench

76.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: A hooded figure appears in frame and sits next to the player on the stone bench facing the opposite direction. The player starts to turn their head to look at the figure, who rebukes them. The player looks forward again.NodeContext: Sharp

57.text: This is your time, not mine. Look inward. See what will be discovered.

85.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
85.text: This is your time, not mine. Look inward. See what will be discovered.

117.speaker: Player
117.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

42.speaker: Player
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

5.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
5.text: Do not be concerned with who I am. Instead consider what I can do for you.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

18.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
18.text: You are here because something grieves you. Perhaps you know what that is. Perhaps you merely think you know.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

112.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
112.text: The Mapping will reveal your heartform. Then the healing can begin.
112.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

60.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
60.text: Answer the questions I put to you. And answer honestly - the lips may try to deceive, but the heart will offer the truth, in the end. Let us begin.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

41.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
41.text: What last caused you to shed a tear?
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

98.speaker: Player
98.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

8.speaker: Player
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

14.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
14.text: So be it. The second question. What is your unspoken desire?
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: *An unfamiliar presence caresses the deepest layers of your mind. You realise she's trying to detect your thoughts.*
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

52.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
52.text: *An unfamiliar presence caresses the deepest layers of your mind. You realise she's trying to detect your thoughts.*
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

103.speaker: Narrator
103.text: *An unfamiliar presence caresses the deepest layers of your mind. You realise she's trying to detect your thoughts.*
103.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Drop the act. You're not here to help - you're trying to dig around in my thoughts.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

63.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
63.text: And this is the most effective way of helping. Besides, you are not above slipping into another's mind - I saw for myself.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

30.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
30.text: But let us spare the pretence. It seems you and I have more to speak of than your heart's struggles.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

47.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
47.text: For the record, you have a violent heart.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

70.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
70.text: For the record, you have a craven heart.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

107.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
107.text: For the record, you have a jealous heart.
107.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

9.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
9.text: For the record, you have a melancholy heart.
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

21.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
21.text: For the record, you have a prying heart.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

3.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
3.text: For the record, you have a false heart.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

44.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

91.text: The second question. What is your unspoken desire?

86.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
86.text: The second question. What is your unspoken desire?

24.speaker: Player
24.text: To run away from it all.

106.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
106.text: Your heartform begins to take shape. The third question. What is your greatest fear?

69.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
69.text: The heartform grows clearer again. Such a burden you carry. But we can help.

82.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
82.text: The fourth question. How would you spite one who wronged you?

97.speaker: Player
97.text: I would not. I would forgive them.

71.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
71.text: Truly? A soft heart is not always a virtue. You have sought our help just in time.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: I would forgive them, but slowly poison them.
75.context: NodeContext: Approving. A drow saying, meaning 'the best knife is the unseen one' Pronounced 'Lill allurl veh-elv zah lill vel-kin us'

81.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
81.text: Ah... lil alurl velve zhah lil velkyn uss...
81.context: NodeContext: Approving. A drow saying, meaning 'the best knife is the unseen one' Pronounced 'Lill allurl veh-elv zah lill vel-kin us'

6.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
6.text: The final question. How would you feel, if all your burdens were lifted?
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

78.speaker: Player
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

40.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
40.text: Truly? Perhaps you crave a dull life then.

74.speaker: Player
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

12.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
12.text: Curious. Perhaps you fear life without conflict. Perhaps you will invent some, for your own gratification.

79.speaker: Player
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

19.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
19.text: Wise. Healthy suspicion can prove to be the finest armour.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: I would manifest new burdens within a tenday.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

11.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
11.text: Perhaps you fear happiness. It is not as uncommon as you may think.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

105.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
105.text: It is done. Your heartform has revealed itself to me.
105.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

38.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
38.text: You possess a violent heart. Rage grips you. Blood inflames you. The House of Grief knows such burdens - and can lift such burdens.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

33.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
33.text: You possess a violent heart. Rage grips you. Blood inflames you. The House of Grief knows such burdens - and can lift such burdens.
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: All right. I want you to help me.
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

87.speaker: Player
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

56.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
56.text: This is your own judgement of yourself. Embrace the truth your heart shares, however painful.
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

90.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
90.text: Our help comes at a price. One that cannot be discussed here. We will talk further, but first, an introduction.
90.context: CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and faces the player, reaching for her hood.

20.text: I am Viconia DeVir. The House of Grief is mine. But what lies beneath... that belongs to my mistress, and that is where you must go.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player looked up at drow woman. Ageless, elegant, silver-haired. Viconia DeVir.

111.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
111.text: I am Viconia DeVir. The House of Grief is mine. But what lies beneath... that belongs to my mistress, and that is where you must go.
111.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player looked up at drow woman. Ageless, elegant, silver-haired. Viconia DeVir.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: Viconia DeVir. Alas, I know you a little too well to follow you into a dark hole in the ground.
102.context: NodeContext: Distaste at seeing an old acquaintance she was forced to travel with in the past.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: Viconia DeVir. Alas, I know you a little too well to follow you into a dark hole in the ground.
45.context: NodeContext: Distaste at seeing an old acquaintance she was forced to travel with in the past.

109.speaker: Jaheira
109.text: Viconia DeVir. Alas, I know you a little too well to follow you into a dark hole in the ground.
109.context: NodeContext: Distaste at seeing an old acquaintance she was forced to travel with in the past.

65.speaker: Minsc
65.text: You! Boo would have caught your foul scent, had you not confounded his nose with evil Sharran incense.
65.context: NodeContext: Low, indignant - not happy to see Viconia again.

7.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
7.text: Always a pleasure to see old acquaintances. But you would be wise to not interfere in what is to come.
7.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

104.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
104.text: She will find the path ahead where she always has.

67.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
67.text: We will talk more down below.

66.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
66.text: You possess a craven heart. You flee when you should fight, seek to soften every hard choice. You are untempered. But we can help.

46.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
46.text: You possess a jealous heart. Your wants are endless. All others are undeserving of any boon next to you. Envy is a fire that will consume you, but we can help douse it.

53.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
53.text: You possess a melancholy heart. A smile is a stranger upon your lips. You do not know what you are missing, but you miss it nonetheless. We can spare you this pain.

2.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
2.text: You possess a prying heart. You crave insights and secrets that are not your own. You live through others, and neglect the self. We can help you rediscover you.

54.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
54.text: You possess a false heart - deceiving as easily others breathe. You hide the truth even from yourself. But your true self is nothing to fear. We can show you this.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: I would be lesser - my burdens moulded me.

92.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
92.text: You know the value of suffering - good. Life is full of it, whether you welcome it or not.

108.speaker: Player
108.text: I would be grateful to the gods.

51.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
51.text: Not all gods are worthy of gratitude.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: *She speaks your mother dialect - 'the best knife is the unseen one'. A curious sentiment for such a place.*

99.text: *She speaks your mother dialect - 'the best knife is the unseen one'. A curious sentiment for such a place.*

77.speaker: Narrator
77.text: *The drow dialect. Something about a hidden knife. A curious sentiment for such a place.*

10.speaker: Player
10.text: I would challenge them publicly, and humiliate them before all.

114.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
114.text: Indeed? Reputations can be slower to heal than flesh...

49.speaker: Player
49.text: I spare them - but hunt down their beloved.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: I would fabricate a grave threat, and let them live in fear of it.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: To indulge every hunger, every lust.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: To bathe in wealth and power.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Do I detect traces of the Underdark in your voice?

58.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
58.text: And what if you did? It is not the timbre of my voice that matters; it is the wisdom it can impart to you.

72.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
72.text: Immaterial. Please, as I said. We are here to help you.

39.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
39.text: Hush. You have already taken the first difficult step. Now you merely have to sit here a while and talk to me.
